name: Evil Dead
description:
Evil Dead is an action-arcade game developed by Trigger Apps. It came out on 06-06-2011. It was published by Trigger Apps. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Evil Dead is available on iOS.
Bruce Campbell, Dino De Laurentiis and Rob Tapert produced the game. It was directed by Sam Raimi. Joseph LoDuca scored the game.
